brainly_data.question: The practical use of science is called
brainly_data.subject: Chemistry

all_answers.question: The practical use of science is called
all_answers.subject: Chemistry
all_answers.text:
The practical use of science is called TECHNOLOGY

TECHNOLOGY is the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry.
